Literature.Title: Biosynthesis of Ilamycins Featuring Unusual Building Blocks and Engineered Production of Enhanced Anti-Tuberculosis Agents
Literature.Author: Ma J, Huang H, Xie Y, Liu Z, Zhao J, Zhang C, Jia Y, Zhang Y, Zhang H, Zhang T, Ju J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):IC50=7.4 µM,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:IC50=33.8 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>122.9µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>122.9µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>122.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>122.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>122.9µM),Micrococcus luteus SC-1(MIC=>122.9µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=0.12µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=9.6µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=3.3µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=3.2µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=3.5µM),Human nasopharyngeal carcinoma CNE2(IC50=6.8µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=4.5µM)
